Html:
I've just added two new wiki pages to the Documentation:

  • http://livegeometry.codeplex.com/documentation
  • http://livegeometry.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Contributing - how to contribute to the project, get source code and submit your changes
  • http://livegeometry.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=CodingGuidelines - coding guidelines that we use

Hope this helps!
